package.name: HTML_Crypt
package.summary: Encrypts text which is later decoded using javascript on the client side
package.description:
The PEAR::HTML_Crypt provides methods to encrypt text, which can be later be decrypted using JavaScript on the client side
This is very useful to prevent spam robots collecting email addresses from your site, included is a method to add mailto links to the text being generated

release.notes:
Made the javascript tag XML compliant.
Changed the uncrypting function to a random string generated by md5() and made the script one line to make it harder to read.
